SELECT R.CONTENTS_ID, ROUND(AVG(CONVERT(FLOAT, R.USE_MINUTE)), 1) AVERAGE, C.NAME FROM RESERVATION R LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENTS_ID = C.CONTENTS_ID WHERE
AND R.DATA_STATE = 'A' AND R.STATE = 0 AND C.DATA_STATE = 'A' GROUP BY R.CONTENTS_ID, C.NAME ORDER BY AVERAGE DESC

SELECT R.CONTENTS_ID, SUM(R.USE_MINUTE) TOTAL, C.NAME FROM RESERVATION R LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENTS_ID = C.CONTENTS_ID WHERE
AND R.DATA_STATE = 'A' AND R.STATE = 0 AND C.DATA_STATE = 'A' GROUP BY R.CONTENTS_ID, C.NAME ORDER BY TOTAL DESC

SELECT Y.YEAR, Y.CONTENTS_ID, Y.COUNT, C.NAME FROM ( SELECT LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10), M.BIRTH), 4) YEAR, R.CONTENTS_ID, COUNT(CONTENTS_ID) COUNT FROM RESERVATION R LEFT OUTER JOIN RESERVATION_MEMBER RM ON R.RESERVATION_ID = RM.RESERVATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON RM.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE
R.DATA_STATE = 'A' AND R.STATE = 0 GROUP BY LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10), M.BIRTH), 4), R.CONTENTS_ID ) Y LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTENTS C ON Y.CONTENTS_ID = C.CONTENTS_ID ORDER BY YEAR DESC, COUNT DESC
